entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES
COLD

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 18
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY

LOWS IN THE MID 20S
